job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
At Quinn, we're on a mission to redefine productivity—by connecting to the tools you use every day, automating repetitive tasks, and powering your potential.
Our greatest excitement comes from imagining a future where your tools work for you, and we're building the most capable team to make that a reality.
We're not taking a traditional approach, and we're not looking for conventional thinkers. Working at Quinn on the 'early team' puts you at the cornerstone of building a world where technology connects and works in harmony—optimizing the lives of yourself and others.
We're exceptionally proud of the company we've built so far and humbled by the work we have yet to accomplish. Our people are Quinn's most significant competitive advantage, and we'll continue investing in them as a cornerstone of our culture.
Key Responsibilities
As an early team member, you will get a chance to shape both the foundations of our product and team culture. We will measure your success by your ability to ship fast, learn quickly, and contribute to our culture of continuous improvement. Additionally, you will
Study and transform data science prototypes
Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools
Develop machine learning applications according to requirements
Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
Train and retrain systems when necessary
Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks
Keep abreast of developments in the field
About You
You're product-minded. You have a sense of excellent user experience and feel for when something is off. You love talking to your team and your customers, and you build for both.
You're a doer. You enjoy all aspects of building a product and are comfortable taking a unique approach when necessary. You create solutions that will lead our company and our industry — on each project, every day.
You're steadfast. You handle chaos, ambiguity, and complexity in a clear, organized way. No job is beneath you, and you lead from the front.
How we Work
We love the tools we use. Here's our go-to's.
Linear for issue tracking
GitHub as source control
Sentry for error reporting
Slack for internal communication
Notion as a knowledge base
Figma for design collaboration
Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
Quinn is proud to celebrate diversity and is committed to building an inclusive workplace regardless of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy and gender identity), national origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, genetic information, age, membership in an employee organization, retaliation, parental status, military service, or other non-merit factors.
If you need any accommodations, please inform our team upon initial connection.
Requirements
Our Ideal Candidate
4+ years of experience at a high-growth startup, consulting firm, or top-tier investment bank
3+ years of Machine Learning experience; including building, deploying, and maintaining systems
Strong work ethic, persistence, humility, and detail-orientation; ability to plan and execute independently
Excel in startups; you come from a diverse background and thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.
Understanding of data structures, data modeling, and software architecture
Deep knowledge of maths, probability, statistics, and algorithms
Ability to write robust code in Python, Java, and R
Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn)
Work authorization in the US
